mapper.select:
select
from regist_item where company_name like concat(concat('%',#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
select max(id) id,company_name from regist_item where company_name like concat(concat(#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select
from regist_item where status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} and company_name like concat(concat('%',#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
